definition.datasource:
from nxstools.pyeval import pco ds.result = pco.triggermode_cb(commonblock, "$(name)", ds.$(name)_triggermode, "$var.filename", ds.$(name)_filestartnum, ds.$(name)_filedir, ds.$(name)_nbframes, ds.$(name)_filepostfix, ds.$(name)_fileprefix, "$(name)_filestartnum", "$var.entryname#'$(__entryname__)'$var.serialno", "$(__insname__)", [ds.$(name)_height, ds.$(name)_width], "uint16", "$var.acq_modes")
$datasources.$(name)_triggermode $datasources.$(name)_filestartnum $datasources.$(name)_filedir $datasources.$(name)_nbframes $datasources.$(name)_filepostfix $datasources.$(name)_fileprefix $datasources.$(name)_height $datasources.$(name)_width
